src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Pa Mande, Sara Danius, mlembi wakukhazikika wa Komiti iyo yikupeleka njombe ya Nobel kwa awo ŵachita makora pa nkhani ya kulemba mabuku pa Swedish Academy, wakapharazga pakweru mu pulogiramu ya pa wayilesi ya Sveriges ku Sweden kuti komiti iyi, yikatondeka kuyowoyeskana na Bob Dylan mwakudunjika kuti yimuphalire kuti wawina nkhombo ya Nobel mu 2016 pa chigaŵa cha kulemba mabuku, ndipo yaleka waka kumupenja kuti yidumbiskane nayo.
hyp_text: Mwina wa Lusiku wa 24, Sara Danius, sekretari yatsogolo ya Komiti la Nobel la Litiyari pa Akademi ya Sweden, pafupi pafika pa program ya radio pa Sveriges Radio pa Sweden, pafika pa komiti, pamodzi ndi kufuna kuwonjezera Bob Dylan, m'phunzi woyamba wa chikhalidwe cha 2016 cha Nobel Prize la Litiyari, ndipo pafika pa nthawi yomwe inu.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.

hyp_text: Dzina la mvula ilipoza la kuipa kwa dzina la dziko la India kuipa kwa ntchito zonse zonse zonse, kuipa kwa nthawi zonse zonse zonse zonse zonse, kuipa kwa nthawi zonse zonse zonse zonse zonse.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Ma ufumu agha yakaŵa yamoza mwa nyengo iyo ŵanthu ŵakafwa chomene mu mbiri ya China wakale vikwi vya ŵanthu vikafwa apo ŵakarwanga kuti ŵakhale pa chizumbi mu nyumba ya chifumu ku Xi'an.
hyp_text: Dziko la Abale la Thandizo lililonse ndi m'modzi m'modzi mwa m'mabvi a dziko la dziko la Machinga a Dziko la China, anthu amodzi amodzi a dolo kwa kuwala ku m'phunzi la ku Xi'an.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Piramidi Chikuru chikazengeka kuti ŵachindike Pharaoh Khufu, ndipo ma piramidi ghanandi yachokoyachoko, nkhwichi, na nyumba za chiuta zikazengeka kuchindika ŵawori ŵa Khufu na ŵanthu ŵa mbuba yakhe.
hyp_text: Mphika wa nthu wa Pharaoh Khufu ndipo dzuwa la anthu, ndipo anthu a dzuwa a nthu wa Khufu ndi a bwanji a anthu a mmodzi, a nthu wa nthu, ndi a nthu wa nthu.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
ref_text: Nyengo iyo vinthu ivi vikachitikanga yikumanyikwa nyengo ya mbiri ya Europe mu virimika vya 1100, 1200, na 1300 (pamanyuma pa kufwa kwa Yesu Khristu mu virimika va 1000-1300).
hyp_text: Dzina la nthawi inu m'modzi mwa nthawi inu ina kupezeka ku High Middle Ages, nthawi ya ku Europe ku 11th, 12th, ndi 13th century (AD 1000–1300).

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
ref_text: Viyelezgero vya sonosono vyakumanyikwa makora pa nkhani iyi ni kampeni ya North Atlantic iyo yikaŵako panyengo ya Nkhondo Yachiŵiri ya Charu Chose. Ŵa America ŵakakhumbanga kunyamura ŵanthu ŵawo na katundu kwambuka Nyanja ya Atlantic kuti ŵakawovwire charu cha Britain.
hyp_text: Munthu wina waoneka kwa nthawi zonse, ndipo yomwe yomwe yinali kuwonjezera kuNorth Atlantic ku WWII. Mabvi a America akuluudwa kufuna kuwonjezera athu ndi nthawi zonse kuAtlantic Ocean kutchokera ku Britain.
